column1: It is sad but true. Autumn is often called the sad time of the year
column2: and it is the sad time. But it shouldn't be. Old Mother Nature never intended that it should be. She meant it to be the glad time. It is the time when all the little people of the Green Forest and the Green Meadows have got over the cares and worries of bringing up families and teaching their children how to look out for themselves. It is the season when food is plentiful
column3: and every one is fat and is
column5: care free. It is the season when Old Mother Nature intended all her little people to be happy
column6: to have nothing to worry them for the little time before the coming of cold weather and the hard times which cold weather always brings.
